price: 209. Mais, si vous avez dévié, après que vous sont venues les preuves évidentes, sachez alors qu’Allah est Tout- Puissant et Sage.
arabic: فَإِن زَلَلۡتُم مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا جَآءَتۡكُمُ ٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتُ فَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٌ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: fa-in zalaltum min baʿdi mā jāatkumu al-bayinātu fa-iʿ'lamū anna al-laha ʿazīzun ḥakīmun
